posts.post_title: GINTER CHAMPIONS N43 1 needed 2 high grade taking offers
posts.post_content:
Like to put this set to bed - 18 years or so since I got the first one and it's time :-)

EDWARDS - VG/x or better but might settle clean VG

wood 86
